openconnector

Interface ConnectorServices


  • public interface ConnectorServices
    A ConnectorServices interface for the things we are currently doing with direct access to sailpoint packages. Every Connector gets an Application [sailpoint.connector] or ConnectorConfig [openconnector] and ConnectorServices implementation. The services provides access from sailpoint api and tools like running rules, database lockups etc.

    Created by ketan.avalaskar.

    • Method Detail

      • runRule

        java.lang.Object runRule(java.lang.String ruleName,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> ruleContext)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute a Rule given the name of a Rule object and the context that will be passed to the Rule during execution.
        Parameters:
        ruleName - - Name of the rule.
        ruleContext - - A name/value map of parameters to pass into the rule.
        Returns:
        - The result of the execution of the Rule.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getObject

        java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.Class cls,
                         java.lang.String name)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve an object by name. Ideally instead of using this method, Connectors should use getAttributeValue() because usually it is particular attribute that Connectors are interested in instead of an entire Object. Not useful for openconnectors as it cannot have dependency on SailPointObjects.
        Parameters:
        cls - - Class that represents SailPointObject.
        name - - Name of the object.
        Returns:
        - SailPointObject by given name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setApplicationAttribute

        void setApplicationAttribute(java.lang.String appName,
                           java.lang.String atrName,
                           java.lang.Object value)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Save attribute in the Application.
        Parameters:
        appName - - Name of the application.
        atrName - - Name of the attribute.
        value - - Value of the attribute.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setApplicationAttributes

        void setApplicationAttributes(java.lang.String appName,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> atrMap)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Save attribute map in the Application. Accept Map of attributes so that locking will happen only once.
        Parameters:
        appName - - Name of the application.
        atrMap - - Mape of attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deepCopy

        java.lang.Object deepCopy(java.lang.Object obj)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a deep copy of the object. This differs from clone() which has historically done a shallow copy.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be copied/cloned
        Returns:
        copy/clone of the calling the object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
